Translations.Text: Mi iuao wawal fellasen, ad asen d Nessuffe$ lweec si tmurt; ad asen yini ar imdanen ur metbutit $ef issekniyen nne£
Ass ideg ara d Nefser, si yal lois, arbaa n wid inekoen issekniyen nne£, d tirni
alamma, mi d usan, ad Yini: "day tnekoem issekniyen iW, ur ten teskecmem di tmusni? Ne$ d acu tellam txeddmem
Iuao wawal fellasen, imi densen. Ur d pmeslayen
Day ur walan ara ar Nerra yasen iv i ureyyee nnsen, ass iwakken ad walin? Deg wayagi, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ass uuuvu n lbuq, ad iagwad i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, siwa wid i S ihwan i Oebbi. A d asen akw $uoeS, s ueiwet
A pwaliv idurar i t$ilev sebken, la teddun am usigna. D igi n Oebbi i Iuegmen yal cci. Neppa, s tidep, Ieoa d acu txedmem
Win id iusan s ise$, ad iawi it yifen. Widak, assen, mevmunit si tugdi
Wid id iusan s tucmip, ad ppin wudmawen nnsen ar tmes. Ni$ a ppeppuqeiiim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Mass n temdint agi, i Ioqa. IneS yal cci. Pwamoe$ d ad ili$ seg imduaen
ad male$ Leqwoan. Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is. Win innetlafen, ini: "nek d aneddao kan
Ini: "a neckeo Oebbi. Ad awen Issken issekniyen iS. A ten taaqlem". Mass ik ur I$effel ara $ef wayen txeddmem
Ism
Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad ak d Neeku si tequii n Musa akked Feraun, s tidep, i ugdud iumnen
Ih, Feraun issem$weo iman is di tmurt; imezda$ ifeoq iten d ieoumen. Isrewrew iayfa segsen, izellu arrac nnsen, issidir tilawin nnsen. Ih, neppa seg ifessaden
Neb$a a Nfeooeo $ef wid irewrwen di tmurt, a ten Nerr d imeqwoanen, a ten Nerr d iweooaten
A ten Nesseqaad di tmurt. A Nessken i Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen, ayen ppagwaden segsen
Nweeea i imma s n Musa: "ssuiiev it, sinna, ma tugadev fellas, err it ar wasif. Ur ppagwad, ur $webben. Ad am t id Nerr, u a t Nerr seg imazanen
Teddem it twacult n Feraun. Ad asen iu$al d acengu, d a$ilif. Ih, Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen llan d imsaben
Tenna tmeiiut n Feraun: "d nnuib n tii, i nek akked kecc. Ur tneqq, ahat ad a$ infaa, ne$ a t nerr d mmit nne$". Nitni ur faqen ara
Temmar ed tasa n yimma s n Musa. Qoib it id tessken, lemmer ur Nzeyyeo ara ul is, iwakken a ppili si lmumnin
Tenna i ultma s: "evfeo it"! Teqquoa t si mbaid, nitni ur faqen
